page.title: 18Farming in the area.
page.content: { {Draper's Farm}has a lot of barns and stockyards.{Board Barn Farm}has a big open barn full of Barley straw and they keep pigs.They also grow forty acres of Potatoes every year. There are two carriage horses called April and May.They pull carriages at weddings.{Lancelot's Farmhouse}was built in 1888.There is a little pond for goldfish and they have a big pond for geese and ducks and an island in the middle and there was a quick way of getting water to put out fires.{Ivy {Todd House}was built in 1763. Many farms in this area used to be{moated} and it is likely that the ponds we have found are the remains of moats.{ {Helions Farm}has a moat and there is a farm called {Moat Farm}near Camps Green.
